original_text: David said to him, ‘You have come to fight against me with a sword, a knife and a spear. But I come to fight against you with the authority of the Lord Almighty. He is the God who leads Israel's army, and you have insulted him!
korean_text: 다윗이 블레셋 사람에게 이르되 너는 칼과 창과 단창으로 내게 나아 오거니와 나는 만군의 여호와의 이름 곧 네가 모욕하는 이스라엘 군대의 하나님의 이름으로 네게 나아가노라

sentences.original_text: You have come to fight against me
with a sword, a knife and a spear
But I come to fight against you
with the authority of the Lord Almighty
He is the God who leads Israel's army
